uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.helpers

Class PluginsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.helpers.PluginsHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class PluginsHelper
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Helper class for SAD plugins' Executions, DO NOT use anywhere but in plugins as it kills threads on failure (on purpose).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginsHelper(String[] args)
      Uses arguments passed to the main java method of the SAD plugin to initialise the plugin within the framework.
